sentences.english: We have to factor that into the calculus.

sentences.english: He invented calculus and investigated the nature of light.
sentences.chinese: 他创立了微积分学，探索了光的本质。

sentences.english: His work in geometry aided in the eventual development of integral calculus.
sentences.chinese: 他对几何学的研究促进了积分学的发展。

sentences.english: Integral calculus ' learning is one is abstract to turn mathematics foundation academics of a higher door of the degree.

sentences.english: This book assumes a basic knowledge of differential and integral calculus.
sentences.chinese: 这本书假装一种不同和积分学的基础知识。

sentences.english: These relationships would prove to be integral from both a collaboration and learning perspective for Yulia.
sentences.chinese: 这些关系将证明是来自一个协作和积分学角度对著。

sentences.english: The course provides an introduction to differential and integral calculus.
sentences.chinese: 本课程主要介绍基本微积分学。

sentences.english: As you will find in multivariable calculus.

sentences.english: In 1686, Leibniz published the first calculus literature.
sentences.chinese: 1686年，莱布尼茨发表了第一篇积分学的文献。

sentences.english: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus .
sentences.chinese: 综上所述就导出了微积分学中的最基本的定理。

sentences.english: The technique he created became known as integral calculus.
sentences.chinese: 他所发明的这个方法后来以积分学著称于世。

sentences.english: This course introduces to students the important concepts and knowledge of vector calculus.
sentences.chinese: 本课程在于描述向量微积分学的重要观念和知识。

sentences.chinese: 方法利用微积分学中求极小值的方法。
